column2: Football Mania
Football mania has overtaken $COUNTRY$. Everyone's playing the bloody sport!
Commercial Aviation
A commercial aviation industry has sprung up in $COUNTRY$.
Blue Riband competition cool-off period
The competition for the Blue Riband has entered a cool-off period.
The Blue Riband
$COUNTRY$ currently holds the Blue Riband, the prestigious award for the fastest crossing of the Atlantic, showcasing our naval engineering expertise.
Ghosts of the Titanic
The Titanic disaster has created a movement calling for stricter safety regulations.
Good Host
We recently hosted a very successful international event.
Bad Host
We recently hosted a very unsuccessful international event.
Liberty Enlighting the World
We are an internationally-recognised beacon of hope to all the tired, poor, huddled masses yearning to breathe free.
World's Fair cool-off period
A World's Fair was hosted recently.
World's Fair Winner
We made quite the impression at the recent World's Fair.
Aigai Excavations
We are currently conducting archaeological excavations at Aigai.
Pella Excavations
We are currently conducting archaeological excavations at Pella.
Dodona Excavations
We are currently conducting archaeological excavations at Dodona.
Forced Monarchy
We tried our best to maintain the Republic, but the Great Powers forced a monarch on us.
League of Nations member
As a League of Nations member, we have reaffirmed our international commitment to peace and diplomacy, striving to avoid armed conflict whevever possible.
Novel Influenza outbreak

This province is experiencing a severe outbreak of the novel Influenza virus, and the government has imposed mitigation measures such as mandatory face masks, forced lockdowns, and cancelation of public event.
Novel Influenza outbreak
This province is experiencing a severe outbreak of the novel Influenza virus, and is especially hard-hit as the government has refused to impose any mitigation measures.
Capital over People

At the height of the Influenza pandemic, when the bodies of the dead were piling up on the streets, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government abandoned its citizens in favour of 'saving the national economy' - it put the interests of the Capitalist class over the working man.
Capital over People

At the height of the Influenza pandemic, when the bodies of the dead were piling up on the streets, the local administration abandoned its citizens in favour of 'saving the local economy' - it put the interests of the Capitalist class over the working man.
The Big Smoke

The rapid industrialisation of the local economy has come at a cost - on the best of days, a haze lingers over the major industrial centres. In the worst of days, it's hard to see even a metre ahead of you.
Building a Metropolitan Railway
An underground Metropolitan Railway system is under construction in this province.
Metropolitan Railway delays
The local Metropolitan Railway has ran into some obstacles, with the completion date is expected to be delayed.
Metropolitan Railway
This province is home to a world-class underground Metropolitan Railway system.
Overcrowded Metropolis
This province is home to a bustling city, but, unlike the other major cities of the world, lacks proper public transport infrastructure in the form of an underground Metropolitan Railway.
